  • Method Details

    • staffFound

      public Staff staffFound​(int staffID, ArrayList<Staff> staffList)
      returns the staff worker found in the restaurant according to their ID
      Parameters:
      staffID - ID of staff
      staffList - list of all the staff workers in the restaurant
      Returns:
      Staff staff

    • getStaffList

      public ArrayList<Staff> getStaffList()
      gets the list of all staff workers in the restaurant
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Staff objects staffList

    • instantiateStaffList

      public void instantiateStaffList()
      Reads in the csv file "StaffList.csv", creating Staff objects as defined by the values in each line Adds each newly created Staff objects into the ArrayList of Staff objects staffList
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if there is no data in the file.
      NumberFormatException - if the entries in the CSV file are not as expected (e.g. String parsed to Integer).
      InputMismatchException - if the entries in the CSV file are not as expected (e.g. String parsed to Integer).

    • addStaff

      public void addStaff()
      Creates a new staff object in the restaurant
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - if the input keyed in is not a number
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input keyed in contains invalid characters

    • updateStaff

      public void updateStaff()
      Updates the details of a staff worker in the restaurant based on the Staff ID keyed in
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - if the input keyed in is not a number
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input keyed in contains invalid characters

    • deleteStaff

      public void deleteStaff()
      Removes a staff worker from the restaurant based on the Staff ID keyed in
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - if the input keyed in is not a number

    • displayStaffList

      public void displayStaffList()
      Prints out the table to display all staff workers and their corresponding details

    • sortStaffList

      public void sortStaffList​(ArrayList<Staff> staffList)
      Sorts the staffList in ascending order of their Staff ID
      Parameters:
      staffList - list of all the staff workers in the restaurant
